title: Cant join/start a queue
body:
When i try to join a queue it says: An unexpected error has occurred while attempting to join the queue.

Can someone help me?

replies.body: When you enter the queue, your network has to transition you over to the rest of the group.  It looks like something is blocking that from happening, but our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help restore comms.  Be sure to test it out in a custom game!

Hey,

Ty for you're time and help, but i got to say that it didnt work. I couldnt find any symptoms that match. Thank you for your attempt...

Thanks for following up though it sucks to hear.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can work individually with you to get this resolved.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to attach some logs to the ticket for context.  We'll get back to you!

Ok Thanks for the help! Im trying it out right now! 

Thanks agian! I hope it works! :D
